name: OREO LAND
short_description:
￼With over 34 MILLION Likes on their Facebook Page, Oreo’s Facebook community is the 4th largest in the Food & Beverage category (only drinks brands like Coke, Red Bull & Starbucks are ahead) and is the 63rd largest community on all of Facebook. 

Naturally with numbers like these, we were really excited to have the opportunity to create an app that would live on their Facebook Page. That, along with the fact that we are HUGE fans of Oreo cookies (boxes of Oreos can easily be found on several desks and tables around the office)... but then again, who isn’t?
summary: ￼With over 34 MILLION Likes on their Facebook Page,
